* Recode old SAT (1600 scale) to new SAT (1600 scale)

recode old_sat (400=400)(410=420)(420=430)(430=450)(440=460)(450=480)(460=490)(470=510)(480=520)(490=530)(500=550)(510=560)(520=580)(530=590)(540=610)(550=620)(560=640)(570=650)(580=670)(590=680)(600=700)(610=710)(620=720)(630=730)(640=740)(650=750)(660=750)(670=760)(680=770)(690=780)(700=790)(710=800)(720=810)(730=820)(740=830)(750=840)(760=850)(770=860)(780=860)(790=870)(800=880)(810=890)(820=900)(830=910)(840=920)(850=930)(860=940)(870=950)(880=960)(890=970)(900=980)(910=990)(920=1000)(930=1010)(940=1020)(950=1030)(960=1040)(970=1050)(980=1060)(990=1070)(1000=1080)(1010=1090)(1020=1100)(1030=1110)(1040=1120)(1050=1130)(1060=1130)(1070=1140)(1080=1150)(1090=1160)(1100=1170)(1110=1180)(1120=1190)(1130=1200)(1140=1210)(1150=1220)(1160=1230)(1170=1240)(1180=1250)(1190=1260)(1200=1270)(1210=1280)(1220=1290)(1230=1300)(1240=1310)(1250=1310)(1260=1320)(1270=1330)(1280=1340)(1290=1350)(1300=1360)(1310=1370)(1320=1380)(1330=1390)(1340=1400)(1350=1410)(1360=1420)(1370=1420)(1380=1430)(1390=1440)(1400=1450)(1410=1460)(1420=1470)(1430=1480)(1440=1480)(1450=1490)(1460=1500)(1470=1510)(1480=1510)(1490=1520)(1500=1530)(1510=1540)(1520=1540)(1530=1550)(1540=1560)(1550=1560)(1560=1570)(1570=1580)(1580=1590)(1590=1590)(1600=1600) into new_sat.
